MemoryInfobox.description: 'Although Kassandra's A Heart for a Head|sacrifice did not save Eteokles (Argolian)|Eteokles, a merchant hoped she could help in other ways, as Eteokles' farm had been taken over by bandits.'

General_Description: '''Falling on Deaf Ears''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following her choice, Kassandra was faced with its consequences.
Section_Dialogue:
A man drew Kassandra's attention in [[Argolis]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Can I help you with something?''
*'''Man:''' ''You're the ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]'' [[Eteokles (Argolian)|Eteokles]] spoke of!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Who?''
*'''Man:''' ''The farmer who owned the [[A Heart for a Head|white bull]]. He was sick, you made a sacrifice to the gods in his name. He's a good friend of mine.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Ah yes. And how is Eteokles?''
*'''Man:''' ''He's dead.''

<tabber>
|-|The gods didn't save him.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The gods are cruel. The only time they show up is to cause more suffering.''
|-|The gods couldn't save him.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''[[Asklepios]] himself couldn't have cured that farmer.''
</tabber>
*'''Man:''' ''Your sacrifice warmed his dying heart. He offered me whatever food was left on his land, but rotten [[bandit]]s took over the farm. He deserved better.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you're hoping I'll kill all the bandits?''
*'''Man:''' ''Exactly. None should be left alive.''
(Accept - I'll hunt the outlaws.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It won't be easy, but I'll take care of it.''
*'''Man:''' ''The [[Fates]] are working in my favor.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra left the [[merchant]] and sought out Eteokles' farm. She slew the bandits there before returning to the merchant.
*'''Man:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.''
*'''Man:''' ''My dear friend, you've earned this!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and slew the bandits, receiving a reward for this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This quest is only available if the farmer was chosen as the target of the prayers in the quest [[A Heart for a Head]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
